name: Leave Application system notification
script:
noti_message = (
            f"A new leave request has been submitted and requires your approval.\n\n"
            f"Employee: {doc.employee_name}\n"
            f"Dates: {doc.start_date} to {doc.end_date}\n"
            f"Reason: {doc.reason}\n\n"
            f"Please log in to the approval portal to review this request."
        )
        
frappe.get_doc(dict(
	doctype = 'Notification Log',
	subject = 'New Leave Application',
	for_user = doc.leave_approver,
	type = 'Alert',
	message = noti_message,
	document_name = doc.name,
	document_type = 'Leave Application'
)).insert()
